revised_title: Inquiries into the Nature of Sleep and the Nervous and Muscular Systems
tldr: The author, A.P.W. Philip, explores the nature of sleep and its relationship to the nervous and muscular systems. He examines the different laws of excitement governing various parts of the brain and spinal marrow and their impact on sleep. Philip also discusses the cause of dreaming and how it relates to the state of the sensitive parts of the brain during sleep.
